title: Travelers Companies Down Nearly 7% After 3Q Earnings Miss — Data Talk
text:
Travelers Companies, Inc. (TRV) is currently at $132.10, down $9.81 or 6.91%

-- Would be lowest close since March 20, 2019, when it closed at $131.33

-- On pace for largest percent decrease since Aug. 8, 2011, when it fell 7.59%

-- Earlier Tuesday, Travelers Cos. said its third-quarter profit was $396 million, or $1.50 a share, compared with $709 million, or $2.62 a share, a year earlier. Core operating earnings were $378 million, or $1.43 a share, missing the $2.35 a share analysts polled by FactSet were expecting

-- Snaps a two day winning streak

-- Down 11.16% month-to-date

-- Up 10.31% year-to-date; on pace for best year since 2017, when it rose 10.8%

-- Up 6.7% from 52 weeks ago (Oct. 23, 2018), when it closed at $123.80

-- Down 7.81% at today's intraday low; largest intraday percent decrease since Dec. 1, 2008, when it fell as much as 15.76%

-- Worst performer in the DJIA today

-- Second worst performer in the S&P 500 today

-- Subtracted 66.52 points from the DJIA so far today

All data as of 11:06:20 AM

Source: Dow Jones Market Data, FactSet

(END) Dow Jones Newswires

October 22, 2019 11:27 ET (15:27 GMT)
